game_description: This is the official VR application of TOKYO GAME SHOW VR 2021. Celebrating the 25th anniversary of TOKYO GAME SHOW (TGS), the first virtual exhibition site in the history of TGS is now open! Set in “GAME FLOAT” floating in the distant ocean somewhere in the real world, enjoy 20 exhibitors spaces, 2 official stores, 3 special video contents, and a theater where you can watch the official TGS2021 ONLINE program on a large screen! In the unique virtual venue where famous characters welcome you, you’ll find a wealth of information about games, from the latest news to the history of TGS. Moreover, visitors can enjoy communicating with each other through voice chat, text message display, replaceable avatar T-shirt, and a channel function that allows you to go around with your friends. In addition, if everyone collects the “Fragments of Crystal” hidden in the venue, the power of connection among game fans will be united...! Event dates: September 30th (Thur.) - October 3rd (Sun.), 2021
